about.title: About
about.subtitle: Designing the future of the web
about.description: I am a French apprentice in my second year of engineering school, with four years of experience as a web developer. Currently looking for a 9-week internship abroad to gain practical experience and enhance my skills. I enjoy collaborating with others, learning new technologies, and tackling challenges with a proactive mindset.
about.hobbies: Sports and travel play an important role in my life : they nurture my curiosity, my drive for self-improvement, and my open-mindedness.

description: Migrated a business-critical application (200+ daily users) from legacy PHP 5 to Symfony
Optimized data models and led feature redesigns, improving performance and maintainability
Collaborated with teams (Product, Development, Support) in Agile context
Designed and deployed a custom ERP used daily by 80+ employees across 10 teams
Built web-based management tools for schedules, meetings, and paid leave
Directed the full project lifecycle: requirements analysis, UI/UX design, database architecture, and implementation
